verbose_text: In this model, TLR9 activation in the TfR (transferrin receptor) and EEA1 (early endosomal antigen 1) expressed early endosomes results in IRF-7 activation and production of type IFNs, whereas activation of TLR9 in the LAMP1 and LysoTracker positive late endosome / lysosome lead to the activation of NF-kappaB and production of inflammatory cytokines [XREF_FIG,].
evidence: TLR9 activation in the TfR (transferrin receptor) and EEA1
